ygData.subject: RE: white out and specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: But wouldn t it be nice if you could move your spells around after their scribed and organize them by the ones you commonly use. I still use Root and Gate
ygData.messageBody:
But wouldn't it be nice if you could move your spells around after their
scribed and organize them by the ones you commonly use. I still use Root and
Gate which are on page 1 & 2 and my 20th level spells are on page 10. Not a
big deal but it would be nice

Aljernon of Karana
22nd Level Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Stokes [mailto:Mark.Stokes@...]On Behalf Of
mstokes
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 10:08 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] white out and specialization


From: mstokes <mstokes@...>


You can scribe any spell, anywhere in your spell book. Keep leaning toward
evocation. Specialize won't increase spell effectiveness. It will only
decrease mana consumption and fizzle rate, and I can't begin to remember the
last time root or gate fizzled on me.
